document.full_text: bruce babbitt, who served as interior secretary in the clinton administration, speaks out against moves by the republican majority in the house to dismantle environmental protections. and he accuses president obama of failing to push back.
document.title: a voice from (and for) the wilderness
lines_and_colors: bruce babbitt, who served as interior secretary in the clinton administration, speaks out against moves by the republican majority in the house to dismantle environmental protections. and he accuses president obama of failing to push back.
